# nunininu-check-os-ver
 - Detects and outputs the os version. 

### Development environment setting
```bash
$ install pdm
$ git clone
$ source .venv/bin/activate
$ pdm install
$ vi ...(coding)
$ TEST
$ pdm install
$ pdm test
$ pip install
$ git add <file_name>
$ git commit -a
$ git push
$ pdm publish
```

```

### USE
```python
$ pip install nunininu-check-os-ver
$ python
>>> from nunininu_check_os_ver.hi import hi
>>> hi()
```
